Can you tell us three facts about Vilnius that people might not know about?Â 

  • Vilnius is the only capital in Europe you can fly above with a hot air balloon. Views of the medieval old town from above are breathtaking.
  • Surrounded by forests and green hills, VilniusÂ is the greenest capital in Europe and the third in the world.Â

Can you tell us a little bit more about Hotel Pacai and itâ€™s neighbourhood?Â 

The hotel is set in the heart of Vilniusâ€™s old town. It is one of the best-preserved in Northern Europe and was inscribed on the World Heritage List in 1994, It is an exceptional illustration of a medieval Central European town that evolved over a period of five centuries. The labyrinthine of Old Town, business district, elegant center, many open squares and parks, coffee places and restaurants, museums, you name it, everything is close to our hotel.
